name: Diggin'Digger
description:
Diggin'Digger is a digging sandbox game, made in GameMakerStudio 2, my really first game made with help from youtube tutorials. If you enjoy it or not, or just want to give a suggestion for further updates go and write a feedback.

The game is pretty hard and simple now but i'm working hard on it to make it more complex. Every 10 minutes the the dig site respawns and you need to save. The tool multiplier is multiplying money and damage. You sell at the Seller (the red one). The blue one is backpack shop and the green one is tool shop.

CONTROLS  :

A, D - Move character | SPACE - jump | F5, F6 - Save and Load | E - action | R - Respawn

Click blocks to destroy them.
